select ai.id, ai.code, ai.province, ai.city, ai.area, ai.address, ai.create_date, ai.contact_person, ai.contact_method, ai.user_id, ai.longitude, ai.latitude, ui.name, ui.code as userCode, ui.images from address_info ai left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ai.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addressInfo.name},'%')
AND ui.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addressInfo.userCode},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{addressInfo.userId}
order by ai.create_date desc
